pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, September 18, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will speak with the Leader of the New Democratic Party, Jagmeet Singh.

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will speak with the Leader of the Official Opposition, the Honourable Erin O’Toole.

Closed to media.
